mnd14:3.5: tassa → idaṁ padaṁ bj, sya-all potthakesu
mnd14:10.6: vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṁ → vūpakaṭṭhakāyānaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | paramavodānappattānaṁ → paramavodānapattānaṁ (pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed, csp2ed)
mnd14:11.5: attā → attaṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | nirattā → nirattaṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd14:12.6: abbahanaṁ → abbūhanaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); abbhuhanaṁ (mr) | papātanaṁ → pavāhanaṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd14:57.2: akittayi parikittayi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānimakāsi pakāsesīti akittayi → akittayīti kittitaṁ ācikkhitaṁ desitaṁ paññapitaṁ paṭṭhapitaṁ vivaṭaṁ vibhattaṁ uttānīkataṁ pakāsitanti-- akittayi (bj, mr)
mnd14:59.8: lokadhātuṁ passeyya, mahāsahassimpi → tisahassiṁ mahāsahassimpi (bj, mr)
mnd14:61.4: atthi jānitabbaṁ → atthi dhammaṁ jānitabbaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | sabbaṁ taṁ → sabbantaṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | parivattati → parivattanti (mr)
mnd14:71.8: mahiṁsā → mahisā (bj); gomahisā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | ḍāho → ḍaho (bj, sya-all) | lohitapittaṁ → lohitaṁ pittaṁ (sya-all, mr)
mnd14:76.6: samudācaranti naṁ → etthantare pāṭho sya-all potthakesu
mnd14:98.4: anavaṭṭhitacārikaṁ → anavatthitacārikaṁ (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1); anvatthitacārikaṁ (sya2ed)
mnd14:101.2: kumbhathūṇaṁ → kumbhathūnaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | sobhanakaṁ → sobhanagarakaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | mahiṁsayuddhaṁ → mahisayuddhaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd14:106.3: janapadakathā itthikathā → itthikathā purisakathā (bj); itthīkathā purisakathā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd14:121.2: nijigīsanatāya → nijigiṁsanatāya (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | na muggasūpyatāya → na muggasūpatāya (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | pīṭhamaddikatāya → piṭṭhimaṁsikatāya (bj); piṭṭhimaddikatāya (mr)
mnd14:143.2: tandiyitattaṁ → idaṁ padaṁ bj potthake ca vb17:37 [Mātikā/ Ekakaniddesa] attadaṇḍasuttaniddese khuddakavatthuvibhaṅge ca
mnd14:144.7: Mukhabherikaṁ → mukhabheriyaṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | mukhaḍiṇḍimakaṁ → mukhadeṇḍimakaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | mukhabheruḷakaṁ → mukhabherulakaṁ (bj)
mnd14:154.3: bījanīhāro → bijanīhāro (bj); vījanihāro (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | saṁvāso → gharavāso (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd14:156.3: Migavākkapāṭhakā → migavākyaṁ. migavākyapāṭhakā (bj); migacakkaṁ. migacakkapāṭhakā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd14:176.3: ukkācanā samukkācanā → ukkāpanā samukkāpanā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | parapiṭṭhimaṁsikatā → piṭṭhimaṁsikatā (mr) | sithilavācatā → mettavācakatā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd14:202.3: sabhaggato → sabhāgato (bj); sabhāgaggato (mr) | parisaggato → parisagato (bj, mr)
mnd14:204.6: asanivicakkadantakūṭasamaṇappadhānenā”ti → asanivicakkaṁ dantakuṭaṁ samaṇappavādenāti (bj); asanīva cakkaṁ dantakūṭaṁ samaṇappadhānoti (si); asavicakkadantakuṭasamānappadhānātiṇṇoti (sya-all); asavicakkadantakuṭasamāṇappadhanātiṇṇoti (pts-vp-pli1)
mnd14:222.2: rūpābhibhū → abhibhūtarūpā (sya-all) | abhibhosi ne pāpake → abhibhosi ne hīne pāpake (bj); abhibhū hi ne hīne pāpake (si, mr); abhibhū hi pāpake (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd14:225.6: namassamāno sakkurumāno garukurumāno → sakkurumāno garuṁ kurumāno (bj); sakkāramāno garukāramāno (sya-all); sakkāramāno garukārayamāno (pts-vp-pli1)
